#labels Phase-Requirements
Semantic Web Ontology generating software library

[http://python-dlp.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/swop.png]

= Introduction =

Takes as input:

  * [http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax Markdown]
  * [http://www.w3.org/TR/swbp-skos-core-spec SKOS]
  * [http://dublincore.org/documents/dces/ Dublin Core]
  * [http://obi.sourceforge.net/ OBI]
  * [http://www.w3.org/TR/owl-ref/ OWL - RDF/XML]

.. and generates an XHTML document which is a GRDDL source document with Manchester OWL syntax documentation of 
the terms in the ontology.  The ontology (expressed as OWL) is a GRDDL result of the source document


= Details =

Uses:
  * [http://www.mnot.net/sw/sparta/ Sparta] (a modified version)
  * [http://rdflib.net RDFLib]
  * [http://4suite.org 4Suite]
  * [http://cheeseshop.python.org/pypi/Amara/ Amara]

Used to generate [http://metacognition.info/ontologies/pomr.html Problem-oriented Medical Record Ontology]
